newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Compuware forecast raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Compuware forecast raised.

text.p: -- Robertson Stephens & Co said analyst Paul Dravis raised his earnings estimates on Compuware Corp and reiterated a buy rating after the company reported a net profit of $0.72 a share in the third quarter ended Dec. 31, 1996 versus a $0.06/shr net loss one year ago.
-- Dravis raised his fiscal year 1997 estimate to $2.43 a share from $2.31 and fiscal year 1998 to $3.20/shr from $2.85.
-- In a statement, Dravis said overall market trend for Compware's mainframe and client/server products, as well as for professional services, should drive revenue growth.
